Text: One of the best albums ever if youré into melodic hardrock like warrant, white lion etc. I´m not kidding they are awesome especially thhe first 2 albums. Then the singer left but now 2006 hhe´s back after 13 years. Can´t wait to hear them again.
Can someone please seed this album?  I've been trying to get this for a long time now.  It's a really good one...
